nodes.text: When I see People using technology, what do I see them doing? What technology use is probable to attract the most attention?

I see this age group being the main drivers in the adoption of the technology and the desire to push for new innovations to see gaps in the market to help develop ways to allow our society to grow past the problems we have e.g. disease and famine
This could even allow them to get to the stage where they are confident with talking to people in person and help improve simple life skills
The danger of over dependence on technology resulting in the loss of ability to physically talk to people normally because you have become too engrossed in your latest piece of technology
New technology has developed over their working life most have adopted the changes as they have occurred but aren’t necessarily as comfortable as the younger generation at using the newer technology
Although the developments are physically benefiting more middle aged adults some of them feel saddened by the loss of the personal touch that was one of the more important factors
For many the main driver for embracing the technology is to keep in touch with family and friends. The ability to communicate and feel part of the family
If they aren’t given the right technology for them and shown the most useful way to use it, they could be lost from the rest of the family
